TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XAttribute extends System.Xml.Linq.XObject

summary.span: 代表 XML 屬性。

span.span: Represents an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 屬性是 XML 項目相關聯的名稱/值組。An XML attribute is a name/value pair associated with an XML element. 每個包含該元素的屬性清單。Each contains a list of the attributes for that element. 屬性必須是唯一項目的限定的名稱。Attributes must have a qualified name that is unique to the element. 屬性不衍生自; 它們不是 XML 樹狀結構中的節點。Attributes are not derived from ; they are not nodes in the XML tree. 而是只是名稱/值組，與元素相關聯。Instead, they are simply name/value pairs associated with an element. 屬性會保留在 XML 樹狀目錄中已加入至元素的順序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 所傳回的屬性集合的時，它們會傳回它們所加入的項目，並不會排序的順序。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added to the element, and are not sorted. 技術上來說，在 XML 中，命名空間宣告不正確的屬性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 不過，這項區別通常不會造成許多 XML 程式設計人員。However, this distinction is not normally made by many XML programmers. 相反地，因為命名空間宣告有完全相同的 XML 語法為屬性，所以大部分的 XML 程式設計人員想像的命名空間屬性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same XML syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要簡化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]程式設計介面、 命名空間以 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 這類命名空間屬性會影響序列化 XML 樹狀結構。Such namespace attributes impact serialization of an XML tree. 序列化時，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]嘗試序列化命名空間屬性中指定的命名空間前置詞。When serializing, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attempts to serialize with the namespace prefix specified in namespace attributes. 您可以使用來判斷屬性是否真的是命名空間宣告。You can use the to determine if an attribute is really a namespace declaration. 類別衍生自 。The class derives from . 您可以將註解加入至屬性，並為其觀察事件。You can add annotations to attributes, and observe events for them. 某些方法可從 XAML。Some methods can be used from XAML. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [LINQ to XML 動態屬性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 XML 樹狀結構的深層複本時，主要是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree. ## Examples 此範例會示範建立 XML 樹狀結構的深層複本會建立複本，而不是複製在樹狀目錄中的屬性。This example demonstrates that creating a deep copy of an XML tree creates a copy, not a clone, of an attribute in the tree. ```csharp XElement root1 = XElement.Parse(""); // Make a deep copy. XElement root2 = new XElement(root1); if (root1.Attribute("Att1") == root2.Attribute("Att1")) Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed"); else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original."); ``` ```vb Dim root1 As XElement = ' Make a deep copy. Dim root2 As XElement = New XElement(root1) If root1.Attribute("Att1") Is root2.Attribute("Att1") Then Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed") Else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original.") End If ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original. ```

value.span: 如果這個屬性是命名空間宣告，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this attribute is a namespace declaration; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 技術上來說，在 XML 中，命名空間宣告不正確的屬性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 不過，這項區別通常不會造成大部分的 XML 程式設計人員。However, this distinction is not normally made by most XML programmers. 相反地，因為命名空間宣告屬性完全相同的語法，大部分的 XML 程式設計人員想像的命名空間屬性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要簡化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]程式設計介面、 命名空間以 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷特定[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]屬性實際上是命名空間宣告。You can use this property to determine if a particular [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attribute is really a namespace declaration. ## Examples 下列範例會建立為命名空間宣告的屬性並不是屬性。The following example creates an attribute that is a namespace declaration and an attribute that is not. 然後，它會使用此屬性以顯示每個屬性是否為命名空間宣告。It then uses this property to display whether each attribute is a namespace declaration or not. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) { if (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name); else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() If (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Then Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name) Else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name) End If Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw is a namespace declaration {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att is not a namespace declaration ```

summary.span: 取得這個屬性的擴展名稱 (Expanded Name)。

span.span: Gets the expanded name of this attribute.
An containing the name of this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的展開的名稱的格式為`{namespace}localname`。The expanded name returned by this property is in the form of `{namespace}localname`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有三個屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 然後，它會使用此屬性可列印出每個屬性的名稱。It then uses this property to print out the name of each attribute. 此範例也會示範建立新的屬性使用現有屬性的名稱。The example also shows creation of a new attribute using the name of an existing attribute. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content"), new XAttribute("Att2", "different content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); Console.WriteLine(""); XElement newRoot = new XElement(aw + "Root", from att in root.Attributes("Att2") select new XAttribute(att.Name, "new content")); foreach (XAttribute att in newRoot.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next Console.WriteLine("") Dim NewRoot As XElement = _ >_ For Each att As XAttribute In NewRoot.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw=http://www.adventure-works.com {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att=content Att2=different content Att2=new content ```

summary.span: 取得下一個父項目屬性。

span.span: Gets the next attribute of the parent element.
An containing the next attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保留在 XML 樹狀目錄中已加入至元素的順序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 所傳回的屬性集合的時，他們是否已新增，且未排序的順序傳回。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 當您要求下一個屬性，透過這個屬性時，這個屬性會傳回這個屬性之後新增的屬性。When you request the next attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added after this attribute. 如果這個屬性沒有父代，或如果沒有下一個屬性，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if there is no next attribute, then this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看使用此屬性項目的屬性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.NextAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.NextAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att1="1" Att2="2" Att3="3" Att4="4" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為所有的類別，衍生自包含屬性，您可以撰寫程式碼的運作方式的具體子類別集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 集合中每個節點的節點類型可以然後測試您的程式碼。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立屬性 (attribute)，然後顯示 使用這個屬性的節點型別。The following example creates an attribute, and then displays the node type using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "content") ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType.ToString) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Attribute ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當轉換成屬性或項目，從允許的值為"0"、"1"，與任何字串，會產生"true"或"false"修剪並轉換成小寫之後。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有屬性值，然後將它轉換成。The following example creates an attribute with a value, then casts it to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("BoolValue", true) ); bool bv = (bool)root.Attribute("BoolValue"); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim bv As Boolean = CBool(root.Attribute("BoolValue")) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` (bool)BoolValue=True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此轉換運算子會使用類別來執行轉換。This conversion operator uses the class to do the conversion. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有日期和時間內容的屬性。The following example creates an attribute with date and time content. 它接著將它轉換成來擷取值。It then casts it to to retrieve the value. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTimeOffset(new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0))) ); Console.WriteLine(root); // casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute DateTimeOffset dt = (DateTimeOffset)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ /> Console.WriteLine(root) ' casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute Dim dt As DateTimeOffset = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), DateTimeOffset) Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` dt=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM -07:00 ```

W3C 規格，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。See the W3C specification for more details. 轉換成時，行為是 lax的從屬性或項目。Behavior is lax when casting to a of from an attribute or element. 即使屬性或項目值的格式不完全是依據 W3C 規格，值會適當地轉換成的。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a of . 使用此轉換運算子將從。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有日期和時間內容的屬性。The following example creates an attribute with a date and time as content. 它接著擷取值轉換為的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)) ); DateTime? value = (DateTime?)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", value == null ? "null" : value.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As Nullable(Of DateTime) = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), Nullable(Of DateTime)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", IIf(value.HasValue, value.ToString(), "null")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable DateTime: value=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ```

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個屬性，字串內容。The following example creates an attribute with string content. 它接著擷取值轉換為。It then retrieves the value by casting to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attribute content") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att"); string str = (string)att; Console.WriteLine("(string)att={0}", str); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att") Dim str As String = CStr(att) Console.WriteLine("(string)att={0}", str) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` (string)att=attribute content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性或元素，其中包含時間範圍內容的值空間被密切期間內容以 ISO 8601 所述。The value space of an attribute or element that contains time span content is closely related to duration content as described in ISO 8601. 建立屬性或元素，其中包含時間範圍的內容時，屬性或項目值的格式依據 W3C 規格中。When creating an attribute or element that contains time span content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 請 W3C 規格，如需詳細資訊，參閱。Please see the W3C specification for more details. 轉換成時，行為是 lax從屬性或項目。Behavior is lax when casting to a from an attribute or element. 即使屬性或項目值的格式不完全是依據 W3C 規格，值會適當地轉換成。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有時間範圍內容的屬性。The following example creates an attribute with time span content. 它接著擷取值轉換為。It then retrieves the value by casting to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new TimeSpan(1, 5, 30)) ); TimeSpan value = (TimeSpan)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As TimeSpan = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), TimeSpan) Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` value=01:05:30 ```

summary.span: 取得父項目的前一個屬性。

span.span: Gets the previous attribute of the parent element.
An containing the previous attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保留在 XML 樹狀目錄中已加入至元素的順序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 所傳回的屬性集合的時，他們是否已新增，且未排序的順序傳回。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 當您要求透過此屬性前一個屬性時，這個屬性會傳回這個屬性之前加入的屬性。When you request the previous attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added before this attribute. 如果這個屬性沒有父代，或如果此屬性的第一個屬性，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if this attribute is the first attribute, then this property returns `null`. 類別會儲存為單向連結清單及其屬性物件。The class stores its attributes as a singly-linked list of objects. 這表示屬性都必須周遊的項目所屬的屬性清單。This means that the property must traverse the list of attributes that belong to the element. 因此，使用這個屬性可能會影響您的效能。Therefore, using this property might affect your performance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看使用此屬性項目的屬性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.LastAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.PreviousAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.LastAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.PreviousAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att4="4" Att3="3" Att2="2" Att1="1" ```

summary.span: 將這個屬性從其父項目移除。

span.span: Removes this attribute from its parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來修改 XML 樹狀結構。You can use this method to modify an XML tree. 這個方法會導致發生的事件。This method will cause events to occur. 有許多情況下您可能會想移除一組屬性。There are many scenarios in which you might want to remove a set of attributes. 在 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]程式設計，您應該不管理或修改一組節點，而您要查詢該集合中的節點。In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming, you should not manipulate or modify a set of nodes while you are querying for nodes in that set. 實際上，這表示您應該不逐一查看一組屬性並將它們移除。In practical terms, this means that you should not iterate over a set of attributes and remove them. 相反地，您應該將這些集合具體化到使用擴充方法。Instead, you should materialize them into a using the extension method. 然後您可以逐一查看清單中，移除屬性。Then you can iterate over the list, removing the attributes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 混合宣告式程式碼/命令式程式碼 Bug (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094)。For more information, see [Mixed Declarative Code/Imperative Code Bugs (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094). 或者，如果您想要移除的屬性集，建議您改用方法。Alternatively, if you want to remove a set of attributes, it is recommended that you use the method. 這個方法會將屬性複製到清單中，然後逐一查看清單中，移除屬性。This method copies the attributes to a list, then iterates over the list, removing the attributes. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有三個屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 它接著會移除其中一個屬性。It then removes one of the attributes. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute("Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute("Att3", "content3") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att2"); att.Remove(); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att2") att.Remove() Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回字串的形式`AttributeName="content"`。This method returns a string in the form of `AttributeName="content"`. > [!WARNING] > 當呼叫這個方法和包含控制字元，例外狀況擲回含有如下訊息： 0x0B 的十六進位值是無效的字元。When this method is called and contains control character, an exception is thrown with a message like: hexadecimal value 0x0B, is an invalid character. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有多個屬性的元素。The following example creates an element with several attributes. 然後它會取得屬性，並顯示它和其內容呼叫這個方法。It then gets an attribute and displays it and its content by calling this method. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute("Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute("Att3", "content3") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att2"); Console.WriteLine(att.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att2") Console.WriteLine(att.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att2="content2" ```
